name: mr_pete
text: That is the onomotopeia of rain on the car roof and pupils dilating with tension.

name: carpetbag
text: Figured it was the engine, but I've been wrong before.

name: philosophe
text: In the next one he starts the car so it must not be.

name: shoinan
text: Pretty sure it is Phillipe trying to start the engine and failing. Note the pukkitas are on Phillipe's side (where the ignition is), his anxious expression and the first panel of the next strip which shows him pleading with the vehicle to start.

name: philosophe
text: Hm yeah I actually don't see much sense to my comment now. Mighta been a lil tipsy....

name: lolsworth
text: What is the plural of pukkita? Pukkitas? Pukkitae?

name: fermatprime
text: DO YOU WANT SOME PUKKITATA?

name: shadowlink_97
text: The van looks like it's shaking a bit, as if trying to start.

name: cunning_p
text: An expository strip, well crafted.

name: clembot
text: YES PHILIPPE. That is the stand up thing to do. Philippe  really keeps his wits about him here.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Yeah, you got to hand it to the little guy, he knows when it's time to cut your losses and just bug the fuck out.

name: straw
text: All drivin with no arms

name: cdl146
text: A comment left by cdl146 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, PoodleLucy, sumisueme)

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Homepie, divot, Cane_5)

name: deusoma
text: No people. it's okay when someone admits they don't find every strip perfect. It's not going to offend the generous Mr. Onstad and make him stop Achewooding.

name: rowen
text:
i whole-heartedly agree, but I am surprised at how low this strip rates. The tiny escaping Phillipe in panel 2 and his confused, scared face in panal 4 easily make this a four for me... but I fived it for being part of my favourite storyline.
Now I question that choice. Damn.

name: rowboat
text:
It's never too late to change it.

Not that I'm losing any sleep over it.

name: orvel
text: Fived for Pete's pose, panel three.

name: canusdivinus
text: The old man scared Philippe more than the murderer. Classic.

name: skaterpix
text: RUN PHILIPPE!

name: evn
text: The pacing on this sequence is really spot-on.

name: atypicaloracle
text: Is Nice Pete angry that his prey is escaping... or trying to call out to the child he is trying to bond with, desperate to explain he means no harm this time?
